resources.string: Akhil Mandai Mandal and its Sharada-Ganesh idol is one of the main attractions of Puneâ€™s Ganesh festival. Celebrating its 129th year, the mandal is witness to freedom struggle and progressive reforms associated with the city.

Mandai, the vegetable market in the old city that has a rich history spanning over 125 years of history, was dominated by a few families, who initiated public celebrations of Ganesh festival and formed the Akhil Mandai Mandal.
